Cards with Left Border + Icon

General Info

Use this design feature to call special attention to an important note or to ask learners to perform a particular kind of action.

Accessibility Note: Proper use of headings within these callout blocks will typically render icons purely decorative, meaning that alt text is not required. However, if no headings are used within the card, consider adding appropriate alt text (e.g., "Alert", "Group work", "Bookmark This", "Downloadable Resource", "Take a closer look"). Doing so can help ensure clearer information architecture for learners using assistive technologies. Alt text for icons should not include the word "icon."

Style Note: These icons must remain white (hex code #ffffff) in color. Learnhow to change icons and icon color in this video tutorial!
